assets/ui/shield2_cyan.png: Flat-top hexagon, neon cyan glowing outline, transparent background, UI element for player HUD shield indicator, clean geometric shape, 512x512

assets/ui/armor_bronze.png: Flat-top solid bronze hexagon, weathered metal texture, scratches and battle damage, transparent background, UI element for player HUD armor indicator, 512x512
assets/ui/armor_bronze_cracked1.png: Bronze hexagon with light crack lines, early structural damage, subtle fractures, transparent background, UI element for damaged armor state (70-40% health), 512x512
assets/ui/armor_bronze_cracked2.png: Bronze hexagon with heavy widespread cracks, severe structural damage, deep fractures everywhere, transparent background, UI element for critical armor state (40-15% health), 512x512
assets/ui/armor_bronze_shattered.png: Bronze hexagon nearly destroyed, large missing chunks, pieces broken away, gaping holes, critical failure state, transparent background, UI element for shattered armor (<15% health), 512x512
assets/ui/hud_mesh_panel.png: Industrial perforated metal mesh panel, wide horizontal rectangular shape, small uniform holes in grid pattern, dark gunmetal gray, matte steel texture, width 2x height ratio, transparent background, game UI element, 1024x512 pixels
assets/ui/digital_display_panel.png: Dark display panel with subtle internal blue-gray glow, faint backlight, powered-on LCD screen appearance, minimal scan lines, active digital display for HUD, 300x80 pixels
assets/ui/display_panel_vertical_green.p: Tall vertical digital display panel, empty dark screen with subtle green internal glow, powered-on backlight, minimal scan lines, no text or graphics, clean empty display area, industrial metal frame edges, tall portrait orientation, transparent background, game UI element, 200x400

assets/ui/shield1_cold_metal_blue_bright: Based on maybe_deepblue: Add bright electric cyan glow to edges and rim of the hexagon, intense neon cyan rim lighting, preserve the weathered metal texture and shape

assets/ui/shield1_cold_metal_blue_teal_a: Based on maybe_deepblue: Add vibrant teal-cyan aqua glow to edges and rim, bright turquoise rim lighting, preserve the weathered metal texture and shape
assets/ui/shield1_cold_metal_blue_lightn: Based on maybe_deepblue: Add intense royal blue glow with electric lightning effects on edges, strong sapphire energy, dramatic blue lighting, preserve the weathered metal texture and shape
